name: Be Rich
description:
Be Rich with all kind of quiz game like:-
General knowledge questions, Current affairs quiz, cricket quiz, Hollywood quiz and geography, biology, physics, chemistry mathematics and reasoning, trivia.
Game Play Guide :

>> Player will have to answer 12 questions to win 1 million.
>> You need to answer all the questions to reach and win 1 million.
>> At the end of the game, you will get a fake cheque.
>> Get 4 different life lines.
>> Life lines are called Audience poll, phone of friend, change question and fifty-fifty.

FEATURES :

* Amazing Graphics
* Interface is clear and convenient
* All New Questions
